tool_description:
Fast and easy to set up PDF2JPG function. In response, it returns a link to the original file and an array of JPG links.

All uploaded files and data are treated as strictly confidential and are never disclosed to third parties. Uploaded files are automatically deleted 10 minutes after the conversion. The converted files may be available up to 10 minutes after the conversion has finished to give the user the chance to download the converted files. Next these files will be securely deleted and...
name: Fast PDF2JPG
title: Fast PDF2JPG

api_list.name: PDF2JPG custom DPI
api_list.description:
Fast and easy to set up PDF2JPG function. In response, it returns a link to the original file and an array of JPG links. 

All uploaded files and data are treated as strictly confidential and are never disclosed to third parties. Uploaded files are automatically deleted   10 minutes after  the conversion. The converted files may be available up to 10 minutes after the conversion has finished to give the user the chance to download the converted files. Next these files will be securely deleted and there is absolutely no way to restore them.

api_list.name: PDF2JPG
api_list.description:
Fast and easy to set up PDF2JPG function. In response, it returns a link to the original file and an array of JPG links. 

All uploaded files and data are treated as strictly confidential and are never disclosed to third parties. Uploaded files are automatically deleted   10 minutes after  the conversion. The converted files may be available up to 10 minutes after the conversion has finished to give the user the chance to download the converted files. Next these files will be securely deleted and there is absolutely no way to restore them.
